title: Sautéed chicken with caramelised onions
ingredients: ['675g (1½lb) medium onions', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breasts, about 115g (4oz) each', 'pepper to taste', '4 tsp butter', '2 tbsp caster sugar', '5 tbsp low-sodium chicken stock', '1 tsp chopped fresh rosemary', '1 tsp chopped fresh thyme', '1 tbsp red wine vinegar']
